bodyV2.markdown:
On the confirmation email you receive from LOVEtheatre, the full price of tickets will always be noted even if you have used a discount code/promotion. However, you will have only been charged the discounted price, and not the full price noted on the email.Â 

We would recommend you check your bank to ensure the correct amount has been charged.

content.name: I entered a discount code but have been charged full price, what do I do?
